body.name: Peg Perego Viaggio Shuttle Plus 120 - Booster Car Seat - for Children from 40 to 120 lbs - Made in Italy - Licorice (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 6 hrs 3 mins
features: 3D TOTAL ADJUST TECHNOLOGY The Viaggio Shuttle Plus can be adjusted in 4 different directions, which are all independent from one another: 1) the headrest 2) the upper backrest 3) the side wings
Integrated rigid LATCH allows for easy installation and stability. The rigid LATCH can also tuck into the seat when it is not in use.
BLIND LOCK ATTACHING SYSTEM Prevents the car seat from being accidentally released by another passenger
REMOVABLE BACKREST When your child is ready for a backless booster, the Shuttle Plus easily transforms into a backless booster with the push of a button
SIP All Side Impact Protection protect's child's head, neck and spine. The wide curving headrest and broad backrest with adjustable side wings help protect against side collisions
body.description: Made In Italy. Protect your child all around with the 2-in-1 Viaggio Shuttle Plus! Its flexibility to adjust all around allows it to fit your child perfectly. Transforming from an all-around adjustable booster to a backless booster, the Viaggio Shuttle Plus will grow with your child! The Viaggio Shuttle Plus has the unique capability to fully accommodate a child's growth with it's 3D Total Adjust Technology. This means the booster can be adjusted in three different locations: 1) the headrest can adjust to five different positions vertically, 2) the upper backrest adjusts three positions vertically, 3) the side wings can expand out three positons. These adjustments can be made independently from each other, allowing for a truly original experience in comfort. Securing the Viaggio Shuttle Plus to the car is made easier with the integrated rigid LATCH, equipped with a blind lock attaching system which prevents the seat from being accidentally released by another passenger. The rigid LATCH can tuck back into the base, allowing for an easy installation if LATCH is not available. An aluminum-reinforced backrest ensures safety and protection against whiplash in the case of a front-end accident and additional protection in the event of a rear-end collision. EPS throughout the side wings and headrest also serves to absorb energy during a crash. The Viaggio Shuttle Plus has the ability to transform into a backless booster to grow with your child. No need to purchase a highback booster and a backless booster when the Shuttle Plus is 2-in-1. With the simple push of a button, the backrest can be removed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally a smart, safe booster design. Worth the money.
reviews.reviewText: I've purchased and returned a dozen boosters and most are so beyond frustrating that I take months off in between shopping. This one finally, finally is smart. It's totally adjustable and will fit any kid. Our daughter is 6. The back of it is aluminum, not cheap plastic, so it is actually sturdy. The rigid latch will secure it to your car, rock solid, even preventing side to side wiggle. And it's narrow, so you can actually get to the seat belt latch. The upper part where the belt goes through is also the best design so far, so the belt can't come out and believe it or not, the "recline" feature actually works. And works well. This is quality Italian engineering and you get what you pay for. Ive confirmed to fit across several BMWs (X3, 5 serie, M3) which are notoriously challenging with latch and rear space, so this should work in any car. And yes, it's price is outrageous. Double or triple what the others cost. It's also better than the cheaper one from the same company because of the aluminum back and adjustability. So if you're like me and ready to give up shopping for these things, know that this one is finally smart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is our second one!
reviews.reviewText: We only had one to start off with, but more than once, I would forget that this seat was in my car and drive to work, only to have my wife call me back home so she could have it back in her car. Now we have two of these seats, one for each car. Good quality and comfortable for my daughter who is taller than the typical 5 year old.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Seat to Beat
reviews.reviewText: So easy to install/remove with or without the rigid latch connectors. The ability to go backless is also nice as we were able to take seat base as a carry-on and use in rental. Quality materials and style. Can’t beat the safety ratings and life span either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality, appearance, and safety. Cup holder way too small and unstable.
reviews.reviewText: Looks great, the fit into the latches is perfect, and perfectly stable. Only thing keeping from 5 stars is even though the seat is for larger kids, the cup holder is tiny and won't stay in place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great seat highly recommended
reviews.reviewText: Quality, Safety and comfort. For this you pay a higher price but has no equal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not certified for use in US
reviews.reviewText: I went to a car seat clinic for help installing this, and found it's not crash tested/certified for use in the US. Went back and checked the info on Amazon, and it's in a link you have to click to open. For the price, this is incredibly disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best booster seat!
reviews.reviewText: Excellent in quality, craftsmanship and design.Soft breathable fabrics. Very comfortable according to my kid. Seems to offer great head and side protection.Rigid latch was easy to use and install.Much easier to install than the pegpergo convertible.Shuttle plus weights 15.6lbsConvertible weights 20.9lbsManufacture date June 2018 and good for 12 years

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good booster seat.
reviews.reviewText: Robust, light to carry, comfortable to the kid (they can sit while crossing their legs), easy to plug and unplug, looks good, and intuitive to use.
